entries.gotowork: I need you to finish that task I gave you earlier.  Ok?
entries.cantwork: I understand you're already working for someone else.  Come back when you're done with that job.
entries.not_it: No, sorry, that's not the item I was looking for...
entries.npc_1_1: My partner needs to get his briefcase back!  He left for a meeting without it.  If you can take it to him I'll have him give you some engraved pens from our company business.
entries.npc_2_1: Excellent.  He'll pay you when you make the delivery.
entries.npc_3_1: Well, if you can't help me I hope I can find someone who can.
entries.npc_reward_1: Here you go.  It needs some ink, but you'll never have one better.
entries.player_2_1: Nah, I don't feel like it.
entries.npc_1_2: My partner was on his way to an auction to sell off some of our assets.  We need the money to keep our business afloat, but he forgot one of the items we were selling.  Can you take it to him?  He's right outside of town.
entries.npc_2_2: Great.  I'll make sure he gets the message that you're coming.
entries.npc_3_2: That's too bad.  I'll find somebody useful.
entries.npc_reward_2: Here you go.  See I had good seats, and I didn't let them tear it.  You should be able to get something for it if you want.
entries.player_1_2: No problem.  I was looking for something to do.
entries.player_2_2: Sorry, I'm a bit busy at the moment.
entries.npc_4_1: All the paperwork that needs to be signed at the meeting.  It's vitally important that it get there.
entries.npc_4_2: It's an autographed trophy from some sports figure.  I don't know who he is, but I want to get it to him so he can sell it.
